name: Fresh Vegetables
description: A mix of fresh, seasonal vegetables, perfect for a healthy meal. Sourced from local farms to ensure the best quality and taste.

name: Fresh Fruits
description: A selection of juicy and ripe seasonal fruits, handpicked for the best quality.

name: Organic Atta
description: Whole wheat flour, organically grown and stone-ground to preserve its natural goodness. Ideal for making soft rotis and chapatis.

name: Basmati Rice
description: Long-grain aromatic basmati rice, perfect for biryani, pulao, and other festive dishes.

name: Sunflower Oil
description: Light and healthy sunflower oil, perfect for all your cooking needs. Rich in Vitamin E and low in saturated fats.

name: Garam Masala
description: A blend of aromatic Indian spices to add flavor and warmth to your dishes.

name: Fresh Milk
description: Creamy and delicious full-cream milk, sourced from pasture-raised cows. Perfect for your morning coffee or cereal.

name: Organic Eggs
description: Farm-fresh organic eggs, laid by free-range hens. A great source of protein to start your day.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic chocolate chip cookies, baked to perfection with a soft and chewy center.

name: Artisan Bread
description: A crusty loaf of artisan-style bread, baked fresh daily. Perfect for sandwiches or enjoying with soup.

name: California Almonds
description: Premium quality California almonds, a healthy and delicious snack.

name: Corn Flakes
description: Crispy golden corn flakes, a classic breakfast cereal to start your day.

name: Chicken Breast
description: Tender, boneless, and skinless chicken breast. A lean source of protein for a variety of dishes.

name: Fresh Salmon
description: High-quality salmon fillet, rich in omega-3 fatty acids. Perfect for grilling or baking.

name: Non-stick Frying Pan
description: Durable non-stick frying pan for healthy, oil-free cooking.

name: Knife Set
description: A set of sharp, stainless steel kitchen knives for all your chopping needs.
